h1: How Many Calories Are in a Bud Light Beer?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) serving of Bud Light lager, chilled, no added mixers or garnishes.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand batch, serving size, and any additions; check labels or official sources for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard Bud Light beer contains about 110 kcal and 6.6 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Bud Light beer?
faqs.a: Approximately 110 kcal per 12 fl oz serving.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Bud Light?
faqs.a: About 6.6 g of carbohydrates per beer, mostly from malt.

faqs.q: Does Bud Light have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimal: 0.9 g protein and 0 g fat per serving.

faqs.q: How does Bud Light compare to other light beers?
faqs.a: Similar to many light beers at 110 kcal; some like Michelob Ultra are lower at ~95 kcal.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Bud Light beer?
faqs.a: Low at about 10 mg per 12 oz serving.
